::Grimmler/Kluster/Firearm::

Grimmler hops up into the CF behind Necromancer, walking behind the 
bot.

"Don't worry, we have quite a few CRs. You'll be allright."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Kluster exits the CR chamber, flexing his repaired arm. "Ah, much 
better."

He instantly sets off to the bridge.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Firearm walks into the bridge of the Cybertronian Fire, looking 
around at all the damage. He groans.

"This is gonna be fun to fix," he says sarcastically to himself, 
picking up a metal panel and leaning it against a wall.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Necromancer let go of Grimmlers shoulder so he could use both hands 
to pull
> himself into the ship. "Hope there's not a long wait for the 
chambers or I
> migh just drain away.." He tried to laugh but his injuries didn't 
like the
> idea. He pulled his weight up and started down the hall holding 
himself
> against the wall as he walked.
